text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn My biggest question, if this really turns out to be as true as it looks like it is, what will CNN do?  They cant or won’t cover it. So, they’ll just keep reporting COVID-19 and hope no one knows the investigation is moving forward.
